page.title: 10Family Size Survey Bathgate
page.content: Over the last year we have been doing street surveys in the Bathgate area. The survey we did was on family size. We decided to use 60 different houses in three different areas of Bathgate. We used one area of old council houses, another area of old privately owned houses and the last area of newer council houses. Analysis of the results showed the three main groups covered in the survey to be:- 1. Husband,wife with no children. 2. Husband, wife with one child. 3. Husband,wife with two children. Surprisingly the highest of the three groups was husband and wife with no children, which had a total of 13 points, closely followed by husband and wife with one child.
